title: 2 Simple Ways to Convert Notes to PDF Files on an iPhone

steps.title: Open Notes .
steps.content: Open Notes . You can find this on your Home screen or App Library.

steps.title: Tap the note you want to export to PDF.
steps.content: Tap the note you want to export to PDF. The note will open so you can make any edits before exporting it to PDF. The note can contain basic text, photos , or even scanned documents .

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . This share icon is in the top-right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Print.
steps.content: Tap Print . It's usually towards the bottom of the menu next to a printer icon.

steps.title: Tap again.
steps.content: Tap again. This is at the top-right corner, next to Print .

steps.title: Tap Save to Files.
steps.content: Tap Save to Files . You can find this underneath Copy .

steps.title: Select a save location.
steps.content: Select a save location. You can pick any folder in the Files app.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This is at the top-right corner. The new PDF will be saved to the Files app. To share it, open the PDF in the Files app, tap the Share icon, and then select an app (such as Mail) to send it.

steps.title: Open Notes .
steps.content: Open Notes . You can find this on your Home screen or App Library.

steps.title: Tap the note you want to export to PDF.
steps.content: Tap the note you want to export to PDF. The note will open so you can make any edits before exporting it to PDF. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . This share icon is in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Markup.
steps.content: Tap Markup . You can find this in the pop-up menu. If you need to add any annotations, edits, or corrections, do so now with the tools below.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . This is at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Save File To....
steps.content: Tap Save File To... . This is the first option.

steps.title: Select a save location.
steps.content: Select a save location. You can pick any folder in the Files app .

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This is at the top-right corner. The new PDF will be saved to the Files app. To share it, open the PDF in the Files app, tap the Share icon, and then select an app (such as Mail) to send it.
